query.name: findAllProtocolActionTypes
query.sql: SELECT irb_protocol_action_type_id, label FROM irb_protocol_action_type ORDER BY 1

query.name: findIRBStudyByStudyId
query.sql: SELECT irb_study_id, study_id, cdc_irb_protocol_number, version1_protocol_date, protocol_officer, submitted_cdc_irb, approval_by_cdc_irb, cdc_irb_expiration_date FROM public.irb_study WHERE irb_study_id=?

query.name: findIRBSiteBySiteId
query.sql: SELECT irb_site_id, site_id, version_number, site_relies_on_cdc_irb, is_1572, COALESCE(cdc_irb_protocol_version_date, CAST('1900-1-1' AS DATE)) cdc_irb_protocol_version_date, COALESCE(local_irb_approved_protocol, CAST('1900-1-1' AS DATE)) local_irb_approved_protocol, COALESCE(cdc_received_local_documents, CAST('1900-1-1' AS DATE)) cdc_received_local_documents, COALESCE(site_consent_package_send_to_cdc_irb, CAST('1900-1-1' AS DATE)) site_consent_package_send_to_cdc_irb, COALESCE(initial_cdc_irb_approval, CAST('1900-1-1' AS DATE)) initial_cdc_irb_approval, COALESCE(crb_approval_to_enroll, CAST('1900-1-1' AS DATE)) crb_approval_to_enroll, COALESCE(irb_approval, CAST('1900-1-1' AS DATE)) irb_approval, COALESCE(expiration_date, CAST('1900-1-1' AS DATE)) expiration_date, active, "comments" FROM irb_site WHERE site_id=?

query.name: createIRBStudy
query.sql: INSERT INTO irb_study (study_id, cdc_irb_protocol_number, version1_protocol_date, protocol_officer, submitted_cdc_irb, approval_by_cdc_irb, cdc_irb_expiration_date) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?);

query.name: updateIRBStudy
query.sql: UPDATE irb_study SET cdc_irb_protocol_number=?, version1_protocol_date=?, protocol_officer=?, submitted_cdc_irb=?, approval_by_cdc_irb=?, cdc_irb_expiration_date=? WHERE irb_study_id=?;

query.name: createIRBSite
query.sql: INSERT INTO irb_site (site_id, version_number, site_relies_on_cdc_irb, is_1572, cdc_irb_protocol_version_date, local_irb_approved_protocol, cdc_received_local_documents, site_consent_package_send_to_cdc_irb, initial_cdc_irb_approval, crb_approval_to_enroll, irb_approval, expiration_date, active, "comments") VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?);

query.name: updateIRBSite
query.sql: UPDATE irb_site SET version_number=?, site_relies_on_cdc_irb=?, is_1572=?, cdc_irb_protocol_version_date=?, local_irb_approved_protocol=?, cdc_received_local_documents=?, site_consent_package_send_to_cdc_irb=?, initial_cdc_irb_approval=?, crb_approval_to_enroll=?, irb_approval=?, expiration_date=?, active=?, "comments"=? WHERE irb_site_id=?;

query.name: createProtocolActionHistory
query.sql: INSERT INTO public.irb_protocol_action_history (irb_site_id, irb_protocol_action_type_id, version_date, version_number, site_submitted_to_local_irb, local_irb_approval, received_docs_from_sites, package_sent_to_cdc_irb, cdc_approval) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)

query.name: updateProtocolActionHistory
query.sql: UPDATE irb_protocol_action_history SET irb_protocol_action_type_id=?, version_date=?, version_number=?, site_submitted_to_local_irb=?, local_irb_approval=?, received_docs_from_sites=?, package_sent_to_cdc_irb=?, cdc_approval=? WHERE irb_protocol_action_history_id=?

query.name: findAllProtocolActionHistoryBySite
query.sql: SELECT iah.irb_protocol_action_history_id, iah.irb_protocol_action_type_id, pat."label", version_date, version_number, site_submitted_to_local_irb, local_irb_approval, received_docs_from_sites, package_sent_to_cdc_irb, cdc_approval FROM irb_protocol_action_history iah INNER JOIN irb_protocol_action_type pat ON iah.irb_protocol_action_type_id = pat.irb_protocol_action_type_id WHERE iah.irb_site_id = ?;
